comment:
There is about 50 assignments due the first month including homework (each homework is about 30 questions), no lectures just 60 page notes for EVERY MODULE, and 10 minutes for the quizzes. 
Group projects are fine.. but the amount of work is ridiculous and most is due at 9:30 PM.
DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!

This guy is terrible. Did not learn nothing all year, does not teach just gives you online videos that are not even his but expects you to know what to do without concise instructions. while still trying to be strict grader. Would not recommend this class to anyone at all.
